name: locutus
description: Locutus assimilaties other languages' standard libraries to JavaScript for fun and educational purposes
author: Kevin van Zonneveld <kevin@vanzonneveld.net>

scripts.build:npm: node src/_util/cli.js --action buildnpm --output dist/index.js && ls -al dist/index.js
scripts.fix: eslint functions bin lib test tools --fix
scripts.release: git commit CHANGELOG.md -m 'Update CHANGELOG.md' && npm version ${SEMANTIC:-patch} -m "Release %s" && git commit test/fixture/*.stdio -m 'Update version' && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run test:utils && npm run test:functions && npm run test:module
scripts.website:deploy: npm run website:inject && cd website && npm run build && npm run deploy
